definitions.definition: To do without (something enjoyable); to relinquish .
examples: I've had to forgo my student discount in exchange for taking the job.

definitions.definition: To refrain from, to abstain from.
examples: I shall forgo actually stepping inside, thank you.

main_definition: To do without (something enjoyable); to relinquish .
secondary_definitions: ( literary ) To refrain from, to abstain from.
